news.title: Melbourne's desalination plant is just one part of drought-proofing water supply
news.summary: Water has now been ordered from the Victorian desalination plant. The plant was built at the end of the millennium drought to provide security against drought.

news.title: Why we can get over the 'yuck factor' when it comes to recycled water
news.summary: In light of climate change and a growing population, water authorities around the world are looking at the treatment of recycled water to achieve water security and sustainability.
